0: Dreadful Afternoon Tea Experience and Very Poor Customer Service
As I said above the room was ok for a nights sleep but not in any way 5 starA nice hotel though very friendly staff and a central location
At no point did this staff member explain that the Radison also deduct 75 pounds per night for extras
They even slapped on a 10 service charge on top if the bill
Our friends room was not cleaned on Saturday and they had to call reception to have it done
Also I had left my laptop in the bedroom and the staff never contacted me – when I asked why I was told no one made a note of the hotel room it was taken from so they had no idea who it belonged to
The service in the bar that particular evening was very slow and the staff were grumpy
The bar was relaxing and pleasant although it was hard to hear the staff speaking to you as the music was loud
Furthermore there was a plate hanging in the room because of environmental reason we should think about not getting the room serviced every day
The staff go above and beyond and the lobby smells incredible not sure what that is but they definitely pump something into the air
1: Great location beautiful hotel no parking on site the nearest one was a bit expensive £ 24 checking in took rather a long time as soon as the Sun came up in the morning the blinds had spaces at the side so there was blaring song coming through so I was awake from 730 complained at reception but nothing done

The reception amazing and the staff upstairs were totally committed to ensuring the day went without a hitchSpecial thanks to Jose for whom nothing was too much trouble and Anna who was an absolute pleasure
Excellent hotel and staff always friendly
The staff great reception area papers fruit high quality linen etc
The staff treat you first class and can not do enough for you

As we parked our car Jonathan the concierge came rushing out to assist us with a luggage trolley and that set the tone for the remainder of our stay attentive considered and consistently high standards from all staff that we engaged with
I booked 2 alfresco suites however on arrival the lovely gentleman behind the reception desk upgraded me to the penthouse
Great location luxurious and excellent customer service
Luxurious friendly staff and perfect stay good location to shops too
